item.name: Bomb
item.details: Range 0-4 tiles, dealing 2d6 damage to all within a 0-2 tile radius. Takes up 1 backpack item slot.

item.name: Strength Potion
item.details: Add 1d6 to combat rolls for 1 fight. Takes up 1 backpack item slot.

item.name: Rusty Armor
item.details: Blocks 1 damage. Takes up 1 Armor slot.

item.name: Dragon Lance
item.details: Range of 1-4 tiles, deals 3d6 worth of damage to the Red Dragon only. Use it to perform a ranged attack, then move in on the same turn for Melee combat. Takes up 1 backpack item slot.

item.name: Spear Trap
item.details: Deals 1d6 damamge to all on a tile. Takes up 1 backpack item slot.

item.name: Poisoned Darts Trap
item.details: Deals 1d6 damamge to all on a tile. Takes up 1 backpack item slot.

item.name: Teleport Crystal
item.details: Move up to 5 tiles or through 1 adjacent wall. Takes up 1 hand item slot.

item.name: Large Axe
item.details: Add +3 to combat rolls. Takes up 2 hand item slots.

item.name: Torch
item.details: Player lays 2 dungeon tiles for 1 AP. Takes up 1 hand item slot.

item.name: Witch's Claw
item.details: Choose and steal an item (including the Ring) from any adventurer on any tile. Takes up 1 hand item slot.

item.name: Loyal Bear
item.details: Add 1d6 to combat rolls. When the player lose a life, return the Bear to the Item pile. Takes up 0 item slots.

item.details: Add +2 to combat rolls. Takes up 1 hand item slot.

item.details: Blocks 2 damage. Takes up 1 hand item slot.

item.details: Range of 1-3 tiles, dealing 1d6 damage. Takes up 2 hand item slots.

item.name: Elven Bow
item.details: Range of 1-3 tiles, dealing 1d6 damage. Takes up 2 hand item slots.

item.details: Player can steal and gain 5 health from an adventurer on any tile. If they have fewer than 5 health, they die, and player may take the remaining health from their next life. Takes up 1 hand item slot.
